title: Khloe Kardashian shops with pregnant BFF Malika Haqq at baby store
text:
When the men in their lives let them down, these women always have each other's backs.

And on Thursday, Khloe Kardashian was right by her bestie, Malika Haqq's, side as they were spotted shopping for baby furniture in Los Angeles.

This will be Haqq's first child, but Kardashian, 35, gave birth to her daughter, True, over a year ago, so the reality TV star is a pro when it comes to knowing what she'll need.

Baby prep: Khloe Kardashian was spotted shopping for baby furniture in Los Angeles on Thursday with her pregnant bestie

The pair was also shopping with Haqq's twin sister Khadijah, 36.

Kardashian donned a loose white button up blouse for the outing, pairing it with destroyed denim jeans and fuzzy heels.

Her long blonde locks were styled in curls that cascaded over her shoulders.

The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star accessorized with silver rings on her fingers and a pair of black sunglasses over her eyes.

Number one! This will be Haqq's first child, but Kardashian, 35, gave birth to her daughter, True, over a year ago, so the reality TV star is a pro when it comes to knowing what she'll need

Peek-a-boo! Her tanned decolletage was on display as her shirt was unbuttoned at the top

Her tanned decolletage was playing a game of peek-a-boo as her blouse was unbuttoned at the top.

A light tan bra could be seen peeking out from underneath the long-sleeve blouse as the wind whipped it around.

While inside the store, the media personality could be seen holding a number of stuffed toys in her hands.

A camera crew was on hand as they filmed for Keeping Up With the Kardashians.

Stuffies: While inside the store, the media personality could be seen holding a number of stuffed toys in her hands

Always filming: A camera crew was on hand as they filmed for Keeping Up With the Kardashians

Gender-neutral: Haqq may not know yet, or care about, the gender of her baby, as Kardashian picked out a number of gender-neutral toys

Haqq may not know yet, or care about, the gender of her baby, as Kardashian picked out a number of gender-neutral toys.

The Dash Dolls star, who announced her pregnancy just last week, wore tight green pants with a long-sleeve grey shirt for the outing.

She carried a beige purse with her as her sleek ombre locks were worn down straight.

The Sky high actress accessorized with a gold necklace and chic clear heels as her petite baby bump peeked out from under her blouse.

Bumpin! Malika's petite baby bump peeked out from under her blouse.

Sisters: The pair was also shopping with Malika Haqq's twin sister, Khadijah, 36

Mom-to-be: Haqq, who announced her pregnancy just last week, wore tight green pants with a long-sleeve grey shirt

Baby bump! The Sky high actress carried a beige purse with her as her sleek ombre locks were worn down straight

Both Haqq and Kardashian are separated from the fathers of their children, and they've leaned on each other for support.

The 20 Years After star took to Instagram after the shopping excursion to let the world know how much love she has for her best friend.

'Not everyone deserves to know the real you. Let them criticize who they think you are. She knows me,' she wrote in the caption of a photo of the two.

Instagram official: The 20 Years After star took to Instagram after the shopping excursion to let the world know how much love she has for her best friend

Haqq hasn't publicly announced who the father of her child is, but it was recently reported that Kardashian is 'toying' with the idea of getting back with her ex, 28-year-old Tristan Thompson.

The two split in February after Kardashian found out that the athlete had cheated on her with her sister's best friend, Jordyn Woods, at a house party in LA.

This adulterous tryst was the second time Thompson had cheated, the first being right before the couple welcomed True in April of 2018.

Try again: She took him back after he cheated on her while pregnant, and now, Kardashian is reportedly considering giving Thompson a third chance at proving he can be faithful, according to a new report by People magazine

She took him back after he cheated on her while pregnant, and now, Kardashian is reportedly considering giving Thompson a third chance at proving he can be faithful, according to a new report.

A source close to the reality star told People magazine: 'Tristan has showed more of an interest. He seems to want more than co-parent with Khloe. It seems Khloe has moments when she is toying with the idea of getting back with Tristan.'

According to People's source, Kardashian's friends and family think she needs help moving on from the Canadian basketball player.

Third chance? It was recently reported that Kardashian is 'toying' with the idea of getting back with her ex, 28-year-old Tristan Thompson

'It seems Khloe needs a good distraction to fully move on mentally from Tristan. She needs to find a special guy, and so far, she hasn't,' the source explained.

The fashion designer had previously said there was 'no' chance the Cleveland Cavalier could win her back.

'I'm looking forward to having a whole new mindset about the month of April,' she said, referring to his previous cheating incidents.

Thompson became a household name when he and Kardashian were first linked in 2016.
description: When the men in their lives let them down, these women always have each other's backs. And on Thursday, Khloe was right by her bestie's side as they shopped for baby furniture.
